title: Easy Killing
body:
Easy Killing

"Get ready for the fight" Around twenty minutes later, the voice of A rank hunter who was floating in the air reverted to the area.

Rumble -!

Just as his voice sounded, all the hunters felt the ground shake a little because of the thousands of monsters who were coming toward them.

Evan and other hunters who will fight directly were standing in front of the formation wall, while the hunters who were long range fighters were standing at the top of the walls with the support class hunters.

When the monster tide came into their sight, the support class hunters quickly took action and casted buffs on the other hunters.

(Your strength is increased by 5% for the next twenty minutes)

(Your agility is increased by 5% for the next twenty minutes)

(Your defence is increased by 8% for the next ten minutes)

(Your mana recovery - - - -)

Evan watched as different notifications came before his eyes one after another.
